Description:
Your Future Looks Bright - 848 sqm. (approx.)
If you're a Young Family, Starter, Investor or Renovator you must see this superbly located brick veneer family home. It's set on a large and level block of 848 sqm. (approx.), and is close to Luther College, Primary schools, shops and transport. The tree-lined street and established gardens create a peaceful vibe. Offering you a comfortable lifestyle or investment now, the light interior gives you scope to further modernise or add your own creative touches if you wish. The spacious and functional floorplan delivers two separate living areas for easy living. Discover a large L' shaped lounge/dining room, and a good-sized family/meals area with doors out to the alfresco deck. The open plan kitchen features a dishwasher, electric oven and gas cooktop. You'll find 3 double bedrooms, along with a central bathroom and separate toilet. Plus a privately-zoned master with ensuite and WIR. Entertain all year round on the big covered entertainer's deck, while the children play in the huge garden. Extras: gas ducted heating, 2 air-conditioners, storage shed and 3-car accommodation comprising double lock-up garage and single carport. Act now to secure your bright future!
* Photo ID required for all Open Home Inspections

* To view our office profile, please click on Virtual Tour Link.

Description:
Under Offer/Under Contract
Looking for a place to settle into and call home? Call off the search! This quality brick veneer family home set on a corner block offers a low maintenance lifestyle with plenty of room for everyone. The expansive living zone includes formal lounge/dining room with pretty bay window and bi-fold doors, and a spacious family room that leads out to good sized deck for alfresco dining and entertaining. The cook's kitchen with open plan meals area will inspire the family Masterchef, with stainless steel appliances, cathedral ceiling and leafy outlook. The master bedroom enjoys walk-thru robe and ensuite - a further 2 bedrooms plus study/possible 4th bedroom provide accommodation for all. Enjoy the sunny front veranda for morning coffee whilst admiring mature gardens complete with Camellias and pretty English trees. Additional features include large brick paved courtyard, ducted heating, split system, fresh neutral décor, some period features, double carport with direct garden access, and under house storage. Conveniently located close to Luther College, local schools, shops, parks, public transport and the beautiful Yarra Valley - inspect this weekend.

Description:
Position, Privacy & Panoramas
Combining flowing interiors with private outdoor areas, this unique family sanctuary is also the ultimate entertainer’s haven. Enhancing warm interiors, sweeping views over the Yarra Valley, Dandenong Ranges and surrounds create a spectacular backdrop for living. Boasting an uplifting sense of space, the layout is further offset by new, polished boards and carpeting. A sunken lounge, warmed by an open fireplace, lies adjacent a formal dining room which logically progresses towards the kitchen. A fabulous workspace, the well-appointed meal preparation zone oversees the open-plan meals and family areas. From here, sliding doors reveal an elevated deck – an idyllic spot to entertaining or recline while watching the hot-air balloons float over the Yarra Valley. Stairs descend to the low-maintenance, child/pet-friendly grounds which incorporate a stainless-steel gas barbeque, built-in trampoline, sandpit and cubby house. Back inside, the bedrooms are zoned for privacy, equipped with built-in robes and serviced by a bright bathroom with spa. The master enjoys mirrored walk-through robes and an ensuite. Offering a lifestyle of comfort and convenience, this fabulous find is only a short stroll to Hodgkins Reserve, children’s playground, walking tracks, Yarra Road Primary and close to Yarra Valley Grammar and Luther College. Chirnside Park is only a five minutes drive away.
Features: evaporative cooling, gas ducted heating, ducted vacuum, newly laid carpet and floorboards & a remote controlled garage.

Description:
Character Cottage Renovated Throughout
Stylishly renovated and superbly located, this picture-perfect weatherboard home will attract First Homebuyers, Investors or Retirees seeking easy living. Situated on a low-maintenance block of 471 sqm. (approx.) - with own street frontage - all the work's done, ready for you to enjoy. You'll love the instant appeal of the beautiful cottage-style landscaped front garden. The warm and light interior features high ceilings and decorative cornices, and is tastefully decorated with contemporary tones, timber-look floors and modern window furnishings. Delight in a spacious new gourmet kitchen/meals area complete with s/s appliances (including Bosch dishwasher), island bar and excellent storage. Unwind in style beside the open fireplace and mantel in the elegant lounge/dining room. Discover 2 double bedrooms (one has BIRs, master has WIR), serviced by a deluxe walk-thru bathroom and separate toilet. A private and tranquil landscaped rear garden with undercover BBQ area invites relaxation and entertaining. Appointments: ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm, great storage and 2-car tandem lock-up garage. Close to local shops, transport, Luther College, Warrien Reserve and EastLink you won't want to miss it!
* Photo ID required for all Open Home Inspections

Description:
Prime Location & Large Family Home
This ideal family home 28sqs. approx is located in a prime residential estate, surrounded by many quality homes and comprises spacious living areas and 4 bedrooms. This grand family home gives you plenty of room to spread your wings, with its formal tiled entrance, vast formal and casual living rooms, and sliding doors to brick paved patios, ideal for outdoor entertainment. This is a home designed for big scale living and entertaining. Enjoy a solid timber kitchen with island bench, ample storage and an Asko dishwasher, plus the comfort of ducted heating, evaporative cooling and a romantic slow combustion wood heater in the rumpus room. Styled with timber venetian blinds, white tiles and Dado wall panels, this neutral setting caters for classic tastes, and offers the privacy of zoned bedrooms with 3 at the rear around a spacious main bathroom and an impressive master at the head of the home with ensuite and walk-in-robe. Including a double remote garage with corner workshop and secure internal access, shady trees in the backyard and side gate access to accommodate up to 4 cars, there’s nothing to do here but move in your brood and organize the housewarming.

Description:
A Walk in the Park
Trendy townhouse positioned within an attractive modern complex boasting relaxed lifestyle.
Modern earthy tones and luxury features offering a true sense of light and space. Three bedrooms including master with ensuite-style bathroom, central living, separate powder, laundry plus secure double lock-up garage with internal access. Spacious, secure landscaped gardens / patio BBQ area, perfect for entertaining. Tranquil setting adjacent to parklands, only 5 minutes to local shops, cafe set, transport
and nearby Chirnside shopping. Schools are but a short commute. Great investment / first home. Well worth your inspection today.
Greg Wittmann : 0409 560 122

Description:
Impressively Yours
As good as new and set in beautiful sunny gardens filled with birdsong, this elevated, light-filled 4 bedroom home is perfectly positioned convenient to every amenity in a most desirable and tranquil estate of fine properties.
Featuring attractive pale stained timber joinery and faultless presentation throughout, its spacious living-dining, kitchen and carpeted family rooms with north, east and west facing windows overlook the generous northern gardens. The tiled kitchen boasts quality appliances, timber cupboards and pantry; it adjoins the family room and sheltered garden terrace with BBQ area - ideal for entertaining. The main bedroom offers a walk-in robe and gleaming ensuite; there are built-in robes in 3 further family bedrooms, an excellent tiled family bathroom and separate toilet. Other amenities include gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling, back-to-base security, spacious low maintenance grounds with terraces and a useful shed and a large double garage with remote operated door. There is extra off-street parking space for 3 more cars.
This calm oasis of family living is a short distance from parkland, schools, buses, Croydon train station, shops, EastLink and the Eastern Freeway.
* Enjoy this outstandingly charming care-free home!
* Quiet position near schools and transport
* Immaculately presented elevated home
* Bright rooms viewing beautiful gardens
* 4 bedrooms, ensuite
Terms 10% deposit, balance 30/60 days
Land: 684 sq m approx.

Description:
Easy Living
Behind the picturesque facade you’ll find a low-maintenance home full of light and charm. Located a short stroll from bus stops and shops, this relaxed residence accommodates formal and informal living requirements. A soft colour scheme is accented by polished boards, creating an uplifting atmosphere. An L-shaped lounge/dining room (warmed by an open fireplace) progresses to a tidy kitchen and meals area. Alfresco entertaining is taken care of courtesy of a paved, covered patio bordered by vibrant lawns. The sleeping quarters consist of spacious bedrooms, each with built-in robes, serviced by a bright bathroom. This lovely abode offers modern conveniences, such as: gas ducted heating, air-conditioning, ample off-street parking, garden shed, single lock-up garage and a double carport.
Presented by PhilipWebb Real Estate.

Description:
Large block with stylish renovations
Positioned in the hub of a court location, this delightful family home has all the necessities and luxuries we adore, including 3 bedrooms, a family sized bathroom with separate toilet, immaculately renovated kitchen/meals with quality SMEG stainless appliances, a dishwasher and glass splash backs. The main living area is spacious with a Northerly appeal and the warmth of a wood heater. Perfect for those chilly winter's days ahead. The size of the block will impress too, with approximately 976 sq Mtrs of yard to play with and a large double garage/work-shed and single garage for the boat or car. Also including an Inverter heating/cooling system, slim line water tank and a quiet, family friendly location. Only a few minutes drive to Chirnside Park, Croydon Main Street or Ringwood, and the conveniences of local shops, schools and bus transportation will delight.

Description:
Lifestyle and Location
If you're ready to experience a first class lifestyle, you will want to act quickly on this BRAND NEW, brick veneer unit with 5* energy rating, with an expected completion date of early February.
An ideal pad for first home buyers, investors or empty nesters with only 3 on the block, you'll enjoy the dual benefits of quality and a private court location. Superbly styled for effortless living and entertaining, it's all here for your pleasure. With the bonus of 3 bedrooms (BIRs, deluxe master ensuite and WIR), plus dazzling central bathroom and laundry. Entertaining will be a breeze with the sleek, open plan kitchen showcasing s/s Italian cooking appliances, dishwasher and breakfast bar. What's more your light-filled interior includes 2 separate living zones. You can relax in the stylish living room or kick back in the good-sized family/meals zone. Decorated to meet today's expectations with contemporary carpets and fresh neutral tones, landscaped gardens, remote double lock-up garage with rear access, ducted refrigerated cooling and gas ducted heating. Handy to local shops, transport, Chirnside shopping, parks/reserves, Oxley College, the Village Primary school and East Link/Eastland. If you're ready for a first class lifestyle, you'll need to be quick!
Maree Slade : 0419 519 282

Description:
A Great Start - Offers Considered Prior to Auction
A family residence superbly sited on 943sqm (approx) and provides potential to renovate or extend (STCA). The 3 bedroom home is enhanced by a combined lounge and dining room that flows into a timber kitchen highlighted by new bench tops, stainless steel appliances and an integrated meals area. Serviced by a recently updated bathroom, the home boasts polished timber floors, gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling. Providing endless hours of enjoyment for all the family, the home leads outside to a private entertaining deck that opens onto a BIG backyard that provides plenty of room to spread your wings! Perfectly positioned in a court location, walking distance to North Croydon shopping facilities, buses and Griff Hunt Reserve and within handy proximity to Yarra Valley Grammar, Luther College and childcare facilities.
Call now for an inspection!
Brett Freeman

Description:
TREAT YOURSELF TO POSITION AND POTENTIAL
Appealing in its pleasant treed surrounds on a tidy 858m2 court corner block with potential to subdivide (STCA) is this family home of clever updated charm. With classy new well appointed hostess kitchen and smart new ensuite effect bathroom, spacious open living with separate dining plus a timber floor family zone provides ample comfortable living. Ducted heating, split system cooling, ceiling fans and an undercover patio just add to the mix. There is a brick double garage and garden shed, still plenty of yard with excellent Griff Hunt Reserve nearby as well as a kids play park. Tops all round, really!

Description:
Storybook Splendour
Resembling something straight out of a fairytale, this picturesque residence is what dreams are made of. Packed with visual appeal, the immaculately presented interior has been cleverly conceptualised to cater for the family as well as the entertainer. The lower level focuses on formal and everyday living; an ornate lounge and dining room progresses to a stunning kitchen (with quality stainless-steel appliances and abundant storage space) which oversees the meals and family areas warmed by an open fireplace. Further to this, a large rumpus is offset by vaulted ceilings. French doors open to reveal a covered deck bordered by gorgeous grounds. Magical mountain views complement the upper level where the sleeping quarters are housed. King-sized bedrooms, equipped with built-in robes, are serviced by a gleaming bathroom with spa bath. The master bedroom boasts an ensuite and large walk-in wardrobe. Adding to the lodging options, a study on entry may double as a bedroom. Located in an idyllic court setting (in easy reach of quality schools, public transport and all necessary amenities), this magnificent home offers a lifestyle unmatched.
Features: downlights, powder room, evaporative cooling, ducted heating, ducted vacuum, alarm system (can be monitored), 2 water tanks totalling 4500 L & internal garage access.
Presented by PhilipWebb Real Estate.

Description:
Big block with potential
At 1640m2 (approx), the block here is big and has potential for development (STCA). Of course you might want to enjoy the property and large family home just as it is. It includes 2 very spacious living areas including the formal lounge with wood heater and awesome family room with timber lining and wet bar to one end, stunning fully equipped timber kitchen, formal dining room and meals area, 3 robed bedrooms and very attractive bathroom. The detail also impresses with polished hardwood floors adding a stylish look and feel, while extras such as ducted heating, Evaporative cooling, split system refrigerated air conditioner and alarm add to the comfort and security of the home. Outside also features a double carport under the home and twin side by side double garages, elevated balcony to take in the views to the Dandenongs, paved patio also with views and of course a stunning location within easy reach of most services.

Description:
Immediate Family Enjoyment
All the work's been done for you with this beautifully renovated brick veneer family home. The spacious layout, along with the fashionable outdoor area, makes it perfect for the young or growing family to enjoy. Pristine landscaped gardens and a super-sized deck create vibrant appeal. The fresh and light interior boasts the ease of 4 double bedrooms (BIRs), a huge family bathroom and vogue master ensuite. Discover a large open plan gourmet kitchen featuring quality appliances, ample benchspace and excellent storage. Two large living areas will make family gatherings easy - a stylish lounge room and an expansive family/meals area. A massive covered deck framed by bistro blinds, gives you an indoor/outdoor room for all-seasons' entertaining. Plus, a spacious landscaped garden for children to play, contemporary window furnishings, quality carpets and a huge laundry with built-in storage. Extras: ducted heating, ducted vacuum, evaporative cooling, caravan parking, storage shed and carport. Ideally located near schools, transport, shops, parks, maternal health centre and EastLink. What more could you ask for?

Description:
Would you renovate, or
What a chance for the keen first home buyer or builder to update and renovate a classic weatherboard home in a premium location. The years may not have been terribly kind to the home, so it's showing signs of its age, but it does have good bones to provide the perfect base to launch your project. Give it a sparkling new kitchen and bathroom, fresh paint and polish or re-carpet the floors and you're on the way there to bringing the home back to its former glory. It already features a terrific layout with 2 or 3 bedrooms, lounge with gas heater and air conditioner, family room with open fireplace, older style kitchen with adjacent meals area. Outside adds a large covered patio and barbecue area behind the home, extensive sheds and bird aviaries, rainwater tank, double garage and very large front garden. As an alternative to renovating, you could also consider the site as perfect for a new home.

Description:
Outstanding Appeal Inside & Out
Set well back from the quiet and desirable cul de sac, the front garden of this attractive brick veneer home adds to the quality environment. Outstanding street appeal might be one thing, but to step inside is to really appreciate its features. The presentation leaves nothing to want, and definitely ensures the only thing you'll have to do once you've moved in is to enjoy. Making your time in the home all the more pleasant will be the 2 formal and casual living areas including lounge with open fireplace and family room/meals area have all your entertaining needs covered. There's also a limed timber kitchen with electric cook top and wall oven and formal dining room as well as 3 bedrooms with built in wardrobes including the main also with bay window and ensuite. The home also features a sparkling family bathroom and ducted heating. It's finished with a pituresque shaded deck that opens from the family room, rear access to a double garage plus a carport that offers the convenience of internal access, and an abundance of underhouse storage. A much desired home with and all services nearby.

Description:
SPLIT LEVEL LUXURY - QUIET LOCATION
A trim box hedge lines the path from double garage to entry. Inside be 'wowed' by the stunning spotted gum polished timber floors and the unique split level design of this utterly charming home. Although of open plan design each gracious room is divinely separated by steps, timber balustrades and featured ceilings. The step down living room has an open fire place and high raked timber ceilings while the rear family room also enjoys the lightness of soaring ceilings.
Dining can be as formal as you wish or as relaxed as the casual meals area by the kitchen or even alfresco style on the covered deck. Impressive granite bench tops complement the blackwood timber gourmet kitchen that includes a chefs dream La Germania stove. And the richly hued slate floor adds a touch of rustic appeal to this inviting home. Ducted heating, ducted vacuum and two split systems exude comfort while both the master ensuite and family bathroom present gracious style and class. Ample wardrobes and storage, easy to manage manicured gardens this home is all about inviting comfort and elegance.

Description:
Family (Floor) Planning!
Perfect for family living, this spacious double-storey residence is supremely comfortable and low-maintenance. Well presented throughout a generously proportioned interior, the layout considers the need for entertaining as well as everyday living. Downstairs, a formal lounge complemented by an open fireplace lies adjacent the dining room which logically progresses to the kitchen - a fabulous workspace easily servicing the casual meals area and rumpus room. Living options extend outdoors courtesy of a covered patio bordered by neat lawns and vibrant plantation.
The sleeping quarters are allocated to the upper level where five bedrooms are serviced by an immaculate bathroom boasting a luxurious spa bath. The master is equipped with abundant robes and an ensuite. Completing the floorplan, a study on the bottom floor may double as guest accommodation.
Expediently situated close to quality schools such as Yarra Valley Grammar and Luther College, the home is in easy reach of bus stops, local shops and a convenience store.
Features:
• Built-in barbeque
• Gas ducted heating
• Alarm system
Presented by PhilipWebb Real Estate.

Description:
Under Offer/Under Contract
Occupying pride of place at the front of an established trio of freestanding residences, this solid three bedroom home with its own street frontage provides abundant living space in a position of convenience. Upon entry, the wide hallway features polished floors revealing the bright, carpeted formal lounge, a sophisticated entertaining area. Across the hall, the master bedroom boasts a walk-in wardrobe and a spacious ensuite. The home extends to the open kitchen, dining and family area, displaying polished floors and double doors directly accessing the paved alfresco area and garden, creating a flow of indoor/outdoor living. Featuring high ceilings, stainless-steel appliances including a 5-burner gas cooktop and a dishwasher, the large kitchen will entice keen cooks! Two more bedrooms with built-in wardrobes share a contemporary family bathroom with a separate shower and bathtub, adjacent to a separate toilet. The remote-controlled double garage offers both external and internal access and further highlights include ducted heating and evaporative cooling, with ample storage. Just metres from the vibrant Croydon North shopping strip, enjoy fabulous local convenience and a quick trip to Ringwood and EastLink.
